pinyin: Quan2 mian4 Jin4 zhi3 He2 shi4 yan4 Tiao2 yue1
da4 qi4 ceng2 he2 shi4 yan4

sentences.english: Methods Bone Marrow Micronuclei (BMM) assay in mice was used.
sentences.chinese: 方法小鼠骨髓微核试验。

sentences.english: Engaged in nuclear testing in 1966, the radiochemical diagnostic technical work.
sentences.chinese: 1966年起从事核试验的放射化学诊断技术工作。

sentences.english: The results of mouse bone marrow micronucleus test was negative. It was not irritative to skin.
sentences.chinese: 小鼠骨髓微核试验结果为阴性，对皮肤无刺激性。

sentences.english: Micronucleus test of Vicia faba root tips cell is used to research the genotoxicity of Trichloroethylene (TCE).
sentences.chinese: 应用蚕豆根尖微核试验研究了三氯乙烯的遗传毒性。

sentences.english: But the United States will not conduct new nuclear testing, and will not develop new nuclear warheads.
sentences.chinese: 但美国将不进行新的核试验，也不发展新的核弹头。

sentences.english: They say the test may be part of an internal struggle.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，这次核试也可能是北韩内部斗争的反映。

sentences.english: Application fee for module exemption through assessment.
sentences.chinese: 透过评核试申请单元豁免费用。

sentences.english: The Chinese government issued a statement saying it resolutely opposes the test.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府也发表声明表示坚决反对北韩的核试验。

sentences.english: A multilateral nuclear test ban treaty was to be signed.
sentences.chinese: 项禁止核试验的多边条约。

sentences.english: The mutagenic effects were not found in micronucleus test (QMM) and testicle chromosome aberration assay (QMM) in PFS group.
sentences.chinese: 小鼠微核试验及睾丸染色体畸变试验均未见诱变效应。

sentences.english: Our country has discontinued nuclear testing.
The DPRK nuclear test was very badly timed - for the DPRK.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜核试验的时机对其自身极为不利。

definition: P'unggye in Kilju county, North Hamgyeong province, the North Korean nuclear test site
abbr. for 朝鮮中央通訊社|朝鲜中央通讯社[Chao2 xian3 Zhong1 yang1 Tong1 xun4 she4]
Kim Jong-un (c. 1983-), third son of Kim Jong-il 金正日[Jin1 Zheng4 ri4], supreme leader of North Korea from 2011
to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
Rodong Sinmun (Workers' news), the official newspaper of the North Korean WPK's Central Committee
